name: RNA Polymerase Chain Rxn
description:
Life as an RNA polymerase aint easy, gotta keep up the workload with synthesizing and transcribing those RNA strands readying them for protein synthesis.

Gotta pass your work down the line and make the cell happy, things aren't going to fix themselves around here. tRNA protein translation will be next, but where's the DNA?  

Confused?  What better way to learn about this process than to do it yourself in a game? 

Welcome to the central dogma of biology!

Made for Tojam in 48 hours.
